item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-03
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Star Market in Chestnut Hill, MA #
  • I'm at Aquitaine Bis (11 Boylston St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Christine loves this place. I have no idea why. — at Longhorn Steakhouse #
  • Christine loves buying pens and markers here. Amazing art supply store. — at Blick #
  • Looking for warmer socks it's going to be a cold week. — at REI #
  • I'm at Peet's in MA #

Powered by Twitter Tools
